quotes.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
Sometimes life is too hard to be alone, and sometimes life is too good to be alone.
One of the greatest regrets in life is being what others would want you to be, rather than being yourself.
He succeeded in being considered totally uninteresting. People left him alone. And that was all he wanted.
Better be alone than in bad company.
Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
There is a certain strength in being alone.
Every time my dreams threaten to become reality, something always happens and I end up alone.
Sometimes you need to sit lonely on the floor in a quiet room in order to hear your own voice and not let it drown in the noise of others.
Everybody is a stranger, but that's the danger in going my own way.
I'd never chosen to be alone, but that was the way things had turned out, and I'd grown used to it.
Always remember that you were once alone, and the crowd you see in your life today are just as unecessary as when you were alone.
Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
The things one experiences alone with oneself are very much stronger and purer.
When they are alone they want to be with others, and when they are with others they want to be alone. After all, human beings are like that.
If you wanted to do something absolutely honest, something true, it always turned out to be a thing that had to be done alone.
People drain me, even the closest of friends, and I find loneliness to be the best state in the union to live in.
No matter how lonely you get or how many birth announcements you receive, the trick is not to get frightened. There's nothing wrong with being alone.
That was the thing about being alone, in theory or in principle. Whatever happened-good, bad, or anywhere in between-it was always, if nothing else, all your own.
Being alone onstage is like legalized insanity.
Loneliness is never more cruel than when it is felt in close propinquity with someone who has ceased to communicate.
Life is too precious to waste it with the wrong person. You're better off alone until the right one comes along.
One's better off alone, and yet there are so many things that are impossible to fathom on one's own. In fact it's a terrible business and the task is a hard one.
The world is my oyster. The road is my home. And I know that I'm better off Alone.
If people let other people alone, people would be better off. It's always people that screw things up for people anyway.
The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
A man can be himself only so long as he is alone, and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom, for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.
It is good to be alone, for solitude is difficult; that something is difficult should be one more reason to do it.
Separate we come, and separate we go, And this be it known, is all that we know.
Being alone is scary, but not as scary as feeling alone in a relationship.
We are born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Everything in-between is a gift.
The man who goes alone can start today; but he who travels with another must wait till that other is ready.
Being alone can be good. It's easy to find peace alone. But sometimes, being alone is a king of death.
